name: GetDevResources
description:
Retrieve development resources from a Figma file.

Use this tool to gather development resources from a specific Figma file using the file key.

parameters.name: file_key
parameters.description: The main file key for fetching development resources from a Figma file. Ensure it is not a branch key.

value_schema.description: The file to get the dev resources from. This must be a main file key, not a branch key.

parameters.name: target_node_ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of node IDs to filter dev resources. If left blank, returns resources for all nodes.

value_schema.description: Comma separated list of nodes that you care about in the document. If specified, only dev resources attached to these nodes will be returned. If not specified, all dev resources in the file will be returned.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the figma API.

parameters.name: node_ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of nodes that you care about in the document. If specified, only dev resources attached to these nodes will be returned. If not specified, all dev resources in the file will be returned.

value_schema.description: Comma separated list of nodes that you care about in the document. If specified, only dev resources attached to these nodes will be returned. If not specified, all dev resources in the file will be returned.

parameters.name: file_key
parameters.description: The file to get the dev resources from. This must be a main file key, not a branch key.

value_schema.description: The file to get the dev resources from. This must be a main file key, not a branch key.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
